name: City Taxi Car Driving
description:
This is an amazing extreme car driving simulation game that will give you pick and drop duty of passenger from stop to stop in NY city. This parking reloaded city car simulator offers a new wonderful transportation, speed and racing game where the passengers have no need to come out from their homes.

Features:
• Extremely Super Car Driving sim .
• High Quality visuals and 3D graphics.
• Multiple camera views to give you the maximum reality experience.
• Most realistic City Car driving simulation.
• Extremely smooth and easy Multi controls.
• Super Marvelous sounds and unique music tracks.
• Realistic simulator experience.
